entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is described as looking desperate and sweating in the torchlight.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who can see Karkaroff sweating.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as a Death Eater and is shouted by Karkaroff.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as someone who has cleared Snape.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as vouching for Snape.

relationships.description: Karkaroff accuses Snape of being a Death Eater.
Karkaroff accuses Snape of being a Death Eater.
Dumbledore was a member of the Death Eaters.
